about_the_game:
In-game Walkthrough mode. It can run in two modes:
HINTS - shows hints only in the most critical scenes.
FULL - always offers the best response if it has the slightest impact on the story's development.

16 4k wallpapers. Some are made from in-game renders, and some are unique. Also, wallpapers are available in 2560x1440 and 1920x1080 formats.

'Wallpapers' folder are located in the game folder. To find it, right-click on Going Rogue in your Steam library and select Manage > Browse local files.

content_descriptors.notes:
The game guide contains graphic and textual depictions of nudity and sexual content, drug use, and violence.
The wallpapers contain nudity and sexual content.

detailed_description:
In-game Walkthrough mode. It can run in two modes:
HINTS - shows hints only in the most critical scenes.
FULL - always offers the best response if it has the slightest impact on the story's development.

16 4k wallpapers. Some are made from in-game renders, and some are unique. Also, wallpapers are available in 2560x1440 and 1920x1080 formats.

'Wallpapers' folder are located in the game folder. To find it, right-click on Going Rogue in your Steam library and select Manage > Browse local files.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+ or Kernel 3.x+ based distributions
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 600 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • Storage: 600 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6
  • Processor: 2Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
